1.12 - Supply of reference samples to the Contract Administrator
• After acceptance of conformance certification for coarse aggregate properties has been accepted by Contract Administrator.
• Prior notice (minimum 48 hours) of time of inspection of sources provided to Contract Administrator.
• Three split samples of each aggregate fraction to be bagged and labelled. Minimum quantities for each aggregate fraction:
Record of conformity: Receipt of samples by the Contract Administrator
Frequency: 1 test per lot, of 1000 tonnes aggregate, not less than 5 days prior to use in production of asphalt.

Note 1: A change in the source rock or face in the quarry will initiate the start of a new lot.
Note 2: A change in the crusher plant screens will initiate the start of a new lot.
Note 3: A change in crushing plant parameters will initiate the start of a new lot.
The signature below verifies that this ITP has been completed in accordance with the FH’s Quality system Procedures and verifies lot compliance with specifications.
